info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 7 at 1:18AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen SD
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Aberdeen SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota...
North Fork Whetstone River near Milbank affecting Grant County.
.For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...North Fork Whetstone River near Milbank.
* WHEN...From early this morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 1056.0 feet, Significant agricultural flooding begins.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 1056.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:15 AM CDT Thursday was 1056.1 feet. - Flood stage is 1056.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr.
The next statement will be issued by Friday morning at 930 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
